##Loading libraries
```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Combining Datasets

```{r cars}
forest_km <- read_delim("forest_area_km.csv")
forest_percent <- read_delim("forest_area_percent.csv")
global_temp <- read_delim("Global_Temperatures.csv")
```
## Checking first few columns in each csv
```{r}
head(forest_km,5) 
head(forest_percent,5) 
head(global_temp,5)
```
## Convert Forms

```{r}
country <- c('Country Name', 'Country Code')

longForestKM <- forest_km %>%
   pivot_longer(!country, names_to = "forest.year", values_to = "km")
longForestKM
```
```{r}

longForestPercent <- forest_percent %>%
   pivot_longer(!country, names_to = "forest.year", values_to = "percent")
longForestPercent
```
## Joining Table Together
```{r}
forest_km_percent <- left_join(longForestKM, longForestPercent)
head(forest_km_percent,5) 
```
